titleStmt.title: SII 7.134: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 134. (A.R. No. 122 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pukaḻmātu viḷaṅka jayamātu virumpa nilamakaḷ nilava malarmakaḷ puṇara yurimaiyiṟ ciṟanta maṇimuṭi cūṭi miṉavar nilaikeṭa villavar kulaitara Eṉai mannava ririya
luṟ ṟiḻitara tikkanaittun tan cakkaranaṭāttic cempon virasiṁhāsanat tavanimuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya kovirājakecaripanmarāna tribhuvanaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkaco
ḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu 3 10 1Āvatu malāṭākiya jaṉaṉātavaḷanāṭṭuk kuṟukkaikkūṟṟattut tirukkovalūrt tiruviṭaikaḻiĀḻvārkku rājentiracoḻavaḷanāṭṭuk kiḷiyūr malaiyamān nāṉūṟṟuvan Attimallanāna rājentracoḻac cetiyarāyanen Iv
vāḻvārkkut tiruvattacāmaccan=ti Onṟukku Amutupaṭi Arici nāṉāḻiyum kaṟiyamutu neyyamutu tayiramu taṭaikkāyamutum Eṅkaḷ vaṁśa muḷḷatanaiyuñ celvatāka Ivvāḻvār tiruviṭaiyāṭṭattil nāṅkaḷ koḷḷakkaṭava perumpāṭikāva luḷḷiṭṭa Āyaṅkaḷ koḷḷā
te viṭṭa 2li In=nila miruveliyuṅ kārum picānamuñ can=tirātittavaṟ cella viṭṭen kiḷiyūr malaiyamān nānūṟṟuva nattimallanāna rājentracoḻac cetiyarāyanen Itukku viṭṭa nilamāvatu kiḻpāṟkellai comaṉ kiḻvarampukku meṟkum teṉpāṟkellai ciṟutūmpuvāykkālu
kku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai Ivvāykkāliniṉṟum punniruṭṭikku poṉa vāykkālukku kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai Añcukuṭṭikkum tiruveṅkaṭattukkuṭṭimarutañcey vāykkālukkum teṟkum Innāṉkellaiyilu mikutikkuṟai vuṭpaṭa nilam Iraṇṭu veliyum viṭṭeṉ rāje
ntracoḻac cetiya
rāyaṉeṉ Itta
ṉmam śrīvayiṣṇava
rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.134 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
